note: Depending on the country and year, inequality data relates to income measured after taxes and benefits, or to consumption, [per capita](#dod:per-capita). The suicide rate is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Suicide rate vs. income inequality
subtitle: The [Gini coefficient](#dod:gini) measures inequality on a scale from 0 to 1. Higher values indicate higher inequality. Suicide deaths are underreported in many countries due to social stigma and cultural or legal concerns. This data is based on modeling of global suicide patterns, and includes adjustments and extrapolations that aim to account for missing data and underreporting.
